Header: Donald Trump says he would be honoured to meet Kim Jong-un
Content: US President Donald Trump has said he would be "honoured" to meet North Korean leader Kim Jong-un, in the right circumstances. He said that if it would be appropriate for him to meet with the North Korean leader, he would - absolutely. He would be honoured to do it. The previous day he described Kim as a "pretty smart cookie". The comments come amid escalating tensions over North Korea's nuclear programme. The White House issued a statement following Trump's remarks, saying North Korea would need to meet many conditions before any meeting between the two leaders could take place.
